titleStmt.title: Advertisement from a noble and potent Earle, Iohn Earle of Errol, Lord Hay and Slaines, high constable of Scotland, sheriff-principall of the sheriffdom of Aberdeen Mr. William More of Hilton, advocate, sheriff depute of the said shyre, and Andrew Skene younger, of Pitmuckston, heritable mair of fee of the said sheriffdom : to the several mair-deputs within the samen.
titleStmt.author: Erroll, John Hay, Earl of.

titleStmt.title: Advertisement from a noble and potent Earle, Iohn Earle of Errol, Lord Hay and Slaines, high constable of Scotland, sheriff-principall of the sheriffdom of Aberdeen Mr. William More of Hilton, advocate, sheriff depute of the said shyre, and Andrew Skene younger, of Pitmuckston, heritable mair of fee of the said sheriffdom : to the several mair-deputs within the samen.
titleStmt.author: Erroll, John Hay, Earl of.
More, William.
Skene, Andrew.

notesStmt.note: "Given under our hands at Aberdeen, the twentysixth day of August 1680. [signed] Erroll. Mr. William More. Andrew Skene."
Reproduction of original in the Aberdeen City Charter Room, Aberdeen, Scotland.
